text: @IvankaTrump #Clueless White House Barbie: What Covid-19 made clear is that we can no longer tolerate an empty suit as an alleged President. Your demented daddy is responsible for the deaths of 90,000 Americans due to his laziness, incompetence and ignorance. He needs to resign now.
